forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 14 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 13 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph.

weather_report:
In the heart of Downtown San Francisco, the day unfolds beneath a vibrant sun, casting a warm glow over the cityscape. With a gentle breeze swirling through the streets, temperatures hover pleasantly around 65, gradually softening to a cooler 63 as the afternoon approaches. The horizon remains clear, although hints of the marine layer linger on the edges, subtly kissing the coast where the Golden Gate Bridge stands tall—a graceful silhouette against the cerulean sky. 

As night draws near, the clouds will begin to weave a tapestry of softness, draping the evening in tones that invite a cozy comfort. So, dress in layers—a light jacket perfect for the cooling breeze, perhaps a soft scarf to ward off any sudden chill as the wind gusts up to 28 mph. This playful afternoon beckons for a stroll along the waterfront or a leisurely visit to a local café, where one can sip rich coffee while watching the sun dip below the horizon, painting the bay in hues of amber.
